about.title: About
about.intro: ðŸ‘‹ Hey! I'm Young, an AI product consultant based in Taiwan
about.brandStatement: I transform scattered conversations, fragmented knowledge, and fleeting inspiration into stable, repeatable, and evolvable systems
about.paragraph1: I spent the last 10+ years building products in EdTech, e-commerce, and NPO sectors. Recently, I've been transferring this expertise to healthcare with great successâ€”leading teams, shipping features that hundreds of thousands of users rely on, and solving real business problems with AI
about.paragraph2: My journey started in education technology, where I built products like Video Chat Learning Module, English Skills AI Module, and Chinese Writing AI Module that helped students learn more effectively. I led engineering teams, scaled products from prototype to production, and learned how to translate AI capabilities into tangible business outcomes
about.paragraph3: Now I help organizations navigate AI transformationâ€”from strategy to deployment. I work with companies that are serious about building AI products that drive measurable impact, not just experimenting with the latest hype
about.paragraph4: Over the past year, I've helped 10+ organizations successfully implement AI products, from medical clinics to education platforms, delivering usable MVPs in an average of 2 weeks

duotopia.title: Duotopia
duotopia.subtitle: D English APP
duotopia.description: AI-powered English learning platform for students aged 6-15. Teachers create 3-tier course architecture and assign reading assignments; students practice recording and receive instant AI scoring (WPM, accuracy, fluency). Built with FastAPI + React, integrating OpenAI Whisper voice recognition and TapPay subscription system.
duotopia.problem: Schools needed a scalable way to assign and grade speaking practice without overloading teachers.
duotopia.solution: Built a 3-tier course builder with AI speech scoring (WPM/accuracy/fluency) and automated assignment flows.
duotopia.result: Cut grading time by 60% and kept students engaged with instant feedback.
duotopia.timeline: MVP in 4 weeks, rolled to classrooms in 2 months.

quotes.quote: Students practice more because feedback is instant; teachers finally have time to coach.

vaitor.title: Video Chat Learning Module
vaitor.subtitle: AI Interactive Video Teaching System
vaitor.description: AI-powered video tutoring system that analyzes educational videos and provides interactive learning experiences. Built with Next.js, Claude AI, and video processing technology, enabling students to interact with video content in real-time.
vaitor.problem: Students watched videos passively and struggled to retain key concepts.
vaitor.solution: Layered AI Q&A and summaries on top of course videos so students can ask, review, and practice instantly.
vaitor.result: Improved comprehension and engagement, validated with pilot cohorts.

quotes.quote: An AI layer that turns any class video into an interactive tutor.

jutor.title: English Skills AI Module
jutor.subtitle: AI Comprehensive English Learning System
jutor.description: AI English tutoring platform providing personalized learning and instant feedback for listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Meta LLM Taiwan Pitch Top 8 finalist, built with FastAPI, OpenAI, and speech recognition technology.
jutor.problem: Learners lacked affordable, always-on English coaching across listening, speaking, reading, and writing.
jutor.solution: Delivered multi-skill practice with real-time pronunciation scoring, grammar feedback, and adaptive difficulty.
jutor.result: Served 150K+ students with 85% satisfaction; reduced manual grading workload by 60%.
jutor.timeline: Pitch-ready in 3 weeks; expanded features over 2 months.

quotes.quote: A practical AI tutor that covers the full language journey.

cutor.title: Chinese Writing AI Module
cutor.subtitle: AI Writing Feedback & Tutoring System
cutor.description: AI-powered Chinese writing assistant that helps users optimize writing content, style, and essay corrections. Built with Claude AI, GPT-4, and Next.js, providing real-time writing suggestions and corrections.
cutor.problem: Teachers spent hours grading handwritten essays; students lacked timely feedback.
cutor.solution: Combined OCR + AI grading to digitize handwriting, auto-score, and generate targeted suggestions.
cutor.result: Enabled award-winning writing program; cut grading time drastically while improving student output.
cutor.timeline: OCR + AI grading live in 6 weeks.

quotes.quote: Proof that AI-assisted writing can be both rigorous and scalable.

vaitorDetail.description:
The Video Chat Learning Module is an adaptive learning platform that revolutionized personalized education for 300,000+ students. By combining natural language processing with intelligent recommendation algorithms, we created a system that understands each student's learning patterns and adapts content in real-time.

The platform analyzes student interactions, performance data, and learning behavior to deliver personalized content paths. Our AI tutoring features provide instant feedback, identify knowledge gaps, and suggest targeted interventions that improved learning outcomes by 40%.
vaitorDetail.feature1: Adaptive learning paths based on individual student performance
vaitorDetail.result1: Improved comprehension and engagement through personalized content
vaitorDetail.result2: Demonstrated measurable learning uplift in pilot cohorts
vaitorDetail.result3: Scaled engineering team and platform reliability to support growth
vaitorDetail.result4: Established dashboards for educators to act on insights

jutorDetail.description:
Developed a comprehensive AI language learning suite consisting of English Skills AI Module and Chinese Writing AI Module. These platforms leverage advanced AI to provide personalized feedback, adaptive practice, and intelligent assessment for language learners.

The English Skills AI Module focuses on all four language skills - listening, speaking, reading, and writing - with real-time pronunciation analysis and grammar correction. The Chinese Writing AI Module specializes in Chinese essay writing and correction, helping students improve their composition skills through AI-powered feedback.
jutorDetail.feature1: Multi-skill English learning (listening, speaking, reading, writing)
jutorDetail.feature4: Adaptive difficulty based on student performance
jutorDetail.result4: Top 8 finalist in Meta LLM Taiwan Pitch

cutorDetail.description:
The Chinese Writing AI Module is an AI-powered writing assistant designed specifically for Chinese writing, originally a manual grading platform. After integrating AI modules, it evolved into an automated grading, intelligent question generation, and writing inspiration system, dramatically improving teacher efficiency and student learning experience. Built with Claude AI and GPT-4, it provides instant, personalized writing feedback.

The standout feature is OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology that enables teachers to quickly digitize handwritten essays for AI grading with precise suggestion comments. AI also helps students generate writing inspiration and easily grasp essay structure, from ideation to completion. This technology helped a leading education nonprofit platform win the Gold Award in the 'Cheng-Chi Cheng Yu-Wei Education Technology Award,' validating AI's practical value in education.
cutorDetail.feature1: OCR Image-to-Text: Automatically digitize handwritten essays for rapid AI grading workflow
cutorDetail.feature2: AI Smart Question Generation: Auto-generate writing prompts based on student level and learning objectives
cutorDetail.feature3: Writing Inspiration Generation: AI assists students in grasping essay structure and brainstorming content, lowering writing barriers
cutorDetail.feature4: Automated Grading & Comments: AI provides precise grammar corrections, style suggestions, and personalized feedback
cutorDetail.feature5: Multiple Genre Support: Comprehensive coverage of academic papers, business copy, and creative writing
cutorDetail.result1: Helped leading education nonprofit platform win Gold Award in 'Cheng-Chi Cheng Yu-Wei Education Technology Award'
cutorDetail.result2: Successfully transformed from manual grading platform to AI automated grading system, dramatically reducing teacher workload
cutorDetail.result3: Enterprise-grade AI writing assistance powered by Claude AI and GPT-4 technology
cutorDetail.result4: OCR + AI grading integrated workflow: digitization and grading of handwritten essays in one seamless process

duotopiaDetail.description:
Duotopia is an AI-powered English learning platform for students aged 6-15, designed to solve critical pain points for English teachers: time-consuming course creation, inefficient assignment grading, and difficulty tracking student progressâ€”while addressing students' lack of instant pronunciation feedback and unclear progress visibility.

The platform employs a 3-tier Content Management System (Program â†’ Lesson â†’ Content) enabling teachers to rapidly create reusable course materials with drag-and-drop reordering, Translation API, and TTS API assistance, dramatically reducing lesson preparation time. After students complete reading recordings, the system integrates Azure Speech API and OpenAI Whisper for real-time voice recognition, automatically scoring WPM (Words Per Minute), accuracy, fluency, and pronunciation while marking specific error locations.

For commercialization, TapPay payment integration supports teacher subscription plans (30-day trial + flexible 1-12 month top-ups), quota management (voice recording billed per second), and automated e-invoice generation. The assignment system features complete lifecycle management (assign â†’ record â†’ submit â†’ AI/manual grading â†’ return for revision), ensuring a fully traceable teaching loop.
duotopiaDetail.feature1: 3-tier CMS Architecture (Program â†’ Lesson â†’ Content): Content reuse, drag-and-drop ordering, Translation API & TTS API assistance
duotopiaDetail.feature2: Azure Speech + OpenAI Whisper Voice Assessment: Real-time scoring of WPM, accuracy, fluency, pronunciation with error location marking
duotopiaDetail.feature3: Complete Assignment Lifecycle: Assign â†’ Auto-save recordings â†’ Submit â†’ AI/Manual grading â†’ Return revision loop, supports multi-content assignments
duotopiaDetail.feature4: TapPay Payment Integration: 30-day trial + flexible top-up (1-12 months), quota management system, automated e-invoice generation
duotopiaDetail.feature5: Student Password Management: Birthdate as default password (YYYYMMDD), email verification mechanism, teachers can view password status to assist student login
duotopiaDetail.result1: Phase 1 100% Complete: Recording, AI scoring, grading system, payment integration fully deployed and production-ready
duotopiaDetail.result2: Full Tech Stack Implementation: FastAPI + PostgreSQL backend, React + TypeScript frontend, Google Cloud Run deployment
duotopiaDetail.result3: Enterprise AI Integration: Azure Speech API voice recognition, OpenAI Whisper transcription, OpenAI TTS voice generation
duotopiaDetail.result4: Solving Teacher Pain Points: 10-minute first assignment setup, AI auto-grading saves 60% time, quota system reduces operating costs

aiSquareDetail.description:
The Project-Based Learning Module is a leading education platform's 'Hour of AI' initiative, inspired by Code.org's global movement that has reached tens of millions of students across 180+ countries through Hour of Code. With Code.org launching Hour of AI in 2025 to focus on AI literacy education, Taiwan joins this global wave through this project, positioning itself as a leader in AI education across Asia.

This innovative program is backed by Microsoft, Meta, and TSMC, featuring two learning modulesâ€”'Industry Exploration' and 'AI Fundamentals'â€”that guide students to understand AI through 'asking, using, managing, and creating.' The core philosophy aligns with the global Hour of AI movement: 'Hour of AI is not about the technology itself, but providing a framework for everyone to participate.' The platform supports 14 languages and aims to engage 250,000 participants, targeting a spot in the global top 5 for AI education participation.
aiSquareDetail.feature4: AI-driven learning content with real-time feedback
aiSquareDetail.feature5: Cross-sector collaboration between government, business, and education
aiSquareDetail.result1: Target 250,000 participants, aiming for global top 5
aiSquareDetail.result2: Supported by Microsoft, Meta, and TSMC
aiSquareDetail.result3: Taiwan's pioneering large-scale AI education initiative
aiSquareDetail.result4: Featured in major news outlets including United Daily News

teacherAiWorkshop.title: Teacher Empowerment Workshop: From AI Apprentice to AI Wizard
teacherAiWorkshop.subtitle: AI Education Workshop - Ahead of Vibe Coding Trend
teacherAiWorkshop.description: AI empowerment workshop designed for teachers, promoting innovative concepts of AI-assisted teaching and coding before the 'Vibe Coding' concept was introduced

teacherAiWorkshopDetail.description:
Designed and facilitated the 'From AI Apprentice to AI Wizard' teacher empowerment workshop, helping teachers master AI tools in educational settings. What's particularly noteworthy about this workshop is that we were already promoting similar concepts and practices before 'Vibe Coding' became widely known.

The workshop features a progressive learning design, starting from basic AI tool recognition (Apprentice stage) and gradually guiding teachers to advanced applications such as AI-assisted lesson planning, teaching material design, and personalized learning (Wizard stage). Through hands-on practice and case sharing, teachers can immediately apply what they've learned in their classrooms to improve teaching efficiency and learning outcomes.
teacherAiWorkshopDetail.highlight1: Ahead of the Curve: Promoted AI-assisted coding education before Vibe Coding concept emerged
teacherAiWorkshopDetail.highlight2: Systematic Training: Complete learning path from AI Apprentice to AI Wizard
teacherAiWorkshopDetail.highlight3: Practice-Oriented: Provided immediately applicable AI teaching tools and methods
teacherAiWorkshopDetail.highlight4: Teacher Empowerment: Cultivated teachers' ability to use AI to improve teaching efficiency

mediatekAiDay.title: 2024 MediaTek Foundation AI DAY - Generative AI Teaching Workshop
mediatekAiDay.subtitle: AI Teaching Applications Speaker
mediatekAiDay.description: MediaTek Foundation's AI teaching innovation event, sharing practical experiences on applying generative AI technology in educational settings

mediatekAiDayDetail.description:
Invited as an instructor at MediaTek Foundation's '2024 Teaching Innovation AI DAY' to share practical experiences of applying generative AI in educational settings. This event focused on integrating AI technology into teaching workflows to improve teaching efficiency and learning outcomes.

Through real-world case studies, demonstrated how to use AI tools to assist teachers in lesson planning, designing personalized learning content, and guiding students to effectively use AI to enhance learning. Also explored ethical issues and implementation challenges of AI in education, providing practical operation guidelines for participating teachers.
mediatekAiDayDetail.highlight1: Shared practical use cases of generative AI in teaching
mediatekAiDayDetail.highlight2: Explored implementation experiences of AI-assisted personalized learning
mediatekAiDayDetail.highlight3: Provided practical guidelines for teachers using AI tools
mediatekAiDayDetail.highlight4: Discussed ethics and challenges of AI applications in education

metaLlmPitch.description: Meta's LLM application hackathon Taiwan region, reached top 8 with English Skills AI learning platform

metaLlmPitchDetail.description:
Participated in Meta LLM Taiwan Pitch hackathon with English Skills AI learning platform and successfully reached the top 8. This is an intelligent English learning platform built using large language model technology, providing personalized learning experiences across all four skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing.

The platform integrates AI technologies such as speech recognition and natural language processing to provide real-time feedback and personalized recommendations for learners. Through an intelligent dialogue system, students can practice situational English conversations and receive targeted pronunciation and grammar corrections, significantly improving learning efficiency.
metaLlmPitchDetail.highlight1: Meta LLM Taiwan Pitch Hackathon Top 8 Finalist
metaLlmPitchDetail.highlight2: Built intelligent English learning platform using large language models
metaLlmPitchDetail.highlight3: Integrated speech recognition and natural language processing
metaLlmPitchDetail.highlight4: Provided personalized listening, speaking, reading, and writing experiences

userxperAiUx.title: Team Innovation Experiments in the LLM AI Era
userxperAiUx.subtitle: 2024 AI/UX Workshop
userxperAiUx.description: As AI technology advances, team dynamics are undergoing massive transformation. This talk explores how AI disrupts traditional division of labor, sharing experimental results and reflections from cross-functional teams, and the impact on organizational efficiency and innovation

userxperAiUxDetail.description:
Invited as a speaker at UserXper Academy's '2024 AI/UX Workshop' to share insights on leading team innovation experiments in the LLM AI era. As AI technology advances, team dynamics are undergoing massive transformation. This talk explores how AI disrupts traditional division of labor, sharing experimental results and reflections from cross-functional teams, and the impact on organizational efficiency and innovation.

The presentation covers: traditional digital team division of labor and its pros/cons, reasons and experiments for disrupting traditional division (product managers building English learning apps themselves, data engineers creating gamification activities, marketing managers independently designing chatbots), and reflections on team innovation experiments (What do bosses really want? What do users really want? How to resolve conflicts between old and new approaches? Is resolution even necessary?). Through real-world case studies, it demonstrates how to successfully drive organizational AI innovation experiments through cross-functional collaboration and tool empowerment despite limited resources.
userxperAiUxDetail.highlight1: Digital-first, cross-functional innovation: Data engineers and product managers collaborated on web products, completing a 6-month project in half a month
userxperAiUxDetail.highlight2: Empowering non-technical teams: Sales teams designed multi-agent systems using OpenAI Playground, product managers rapid prototyping with no-code tools
userxperAiUxDetail.highlight3: Gradual team transformation: Design team started with Canva, progressively adapting to AI tools to avoid anxiety from excessive change
userxperAiUxDetail.highlight4: Real-world case studies: Including Star Adventure AI version, English Skills AI Module, Dream More AI assistance, and more
